embed.description: EssentialsX provides over 130 commands for Minecraft servers of any size and scale.

fields.name: Downloads
fields.value:
You can download the latest dev builds [here](https://essentialsx.cf/downloads.html).
Current dev builds support Minecraft versions 1.8.8-1.15.2.

fields.name: Useful links
fields.value:
• Wiki: <https://essentialsx.cf/wiki/Home.html>
